title: Explanation
clause_text: Explanation. -- Age of a building shall be as on the 1st of January of the year in which redevelopment proposal for the URC complete in all respects, is submitted to the Officer appointed by the Planning Authority and shall be calculated from the date of occupation certificate or where such occupation certificate is not available, from the first date of assessment as per the property tax record in respect of such building, available with the PWD.
section: 33(9) (B): Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster of BDD chawls at Naigaon, Worli, N.M.Joshi Marg and Shivdi under Urban Renewal Scheme(s).
